title: Plaguebearer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may choose to infect a player with the Plague each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Infections spread when a player visits or is visited by an Infected player.
- You will Infect anyone that visits you.
- Players will not be notified that they are Infected.
- When all living players are infected, you will transform into (3874) Pestilence.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully infect all living players and become Pestilence.
